short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights specified surnames on genealogy pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genealogy buffs! Everyone should have this handy tool, which highlights the surnames you are looking for on busy pages. If you've ever squinted at a Gedmatch pedigree list or tried to find your relative's name in a tree with tiny letters or just wanted to know if your ancestor was mentioned in long-winded will or property transaction, this plugin will save you heaps of time!
